pageProduct.name: Andalou Acai + Kombucha Oil-Free Moisturiser 62ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Fruit stem cell complex with argan stem cells, acai berry, and kombucha probiotics nourish and fortify as aloe vera polysaccharides soothe and condition with oil-free hydration for a clear, balanced complexion.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid direct contact with eyes.

Common Uses

Facial Moisturizer For Active & Oily Skin Types

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Purified Water (Aqua), Vegetable Glycerin, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Cetyl Alcohol, Saccharomyces Xylinum (Kombucha) Black Tea Ferment, Glyceryl Stearate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Fruit Stem Cells (Argan, Malus Domestica, Solar Vitis) and BioActive Berry Complex*, Panthenol, Allantoin, Stearic Acid, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch*, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai) Fruit Extract*, Salix Alba (Willow Bark) Extract*, Tocopherol, Olive Squalane, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract*, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Extract*, Phenethyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil*, Cymbopogon Martini (Palmarosa) Leaf Oil*

Directions

Daily. Apply to clean face and neck.
